LOCATION

Uniquely overlooking the Holiest place on earth, Al Haram, Le Meridien Makkah is only 100 meters away from King Abdulaziz gate. The hotel’s immediate location on King Abdulaziz Street provides a direct access to other holy locations in Mina and Arafat. With its 22-floor building and shiny glass facades, which amazingly reflect the image of the Holy Haram, the hotel’s unique architectural features truly deserve the vicinity of the Holy Haram.

THE HOTEL

The hotel’s eye-catching exterior encloses another world of elegance in its fashionable interior. Located in one of the oldest cities and featuring the spacious Royal Suite, panoramic views of the Holy City, security, convenience and many other facilities, most of which overlook the Holy Haram, the interior presents a perfect match between design and luxurious furniture. Other features that are unique to the heritage of Le Meridien international hotels include the outstanding services and the state of the art equipments.
